entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @realDonaldTrump Dear Mr. President , You should follow jacinda ardern prime minister of New Zealand and get rid of this coronavirus like they did. You needed to have a total lockdown and disinfect everything out on the streets etc. Each governor could of done this in each state.
